data.title: North East, Pennsylvania Current Local Time and Time Zone
data.meta_description: Current local time in North East, Pennsylvania with information about North East, Pennsylvania official time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
Current Local Time

North East, Pennsylvania is officially in the Eastern Time Zone

The Current Time in

North East, Pennsylvania is:

Sunday

8/18/2024

5:57 AM

EDT

North East, Pennsylvania

is in the

Eastern Time Zone

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Eastern Standard Time - is abbreviated as EST

Eastern Daylight Time - is abbreviated as EDT

UTC - GMT

Offset

North East, Pennsylvania is GMT/UTC - 5h during Standard Time

North East, Pennsylvania is GMT/UTC - 4h during Daylight Saving Time

Daylight Saving

Start Date

North East, Pennsylvania starts Daylight Saving Time on

Sunday March 10, 2024 at 2:00 AM local time.
